thread.section_title: Timepiece Bank Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Timepiece Bank | timepiecebank.com
thread.title: EB

author: EB
title: EB
text:
I would like to thank Jolien from Timepiece Bank for such wonderful service. Questions were answered very quickly and the whole process was extremely smooth and professional.
Seeing as it was my first big watch I had it checked, with Jolien's assurance that "if its a fake I will refund the money". Local Rolex dealer confirmed that it was a brand new, authentic rolex. (still in all the stickers) So from Timepiece bank i bought a brand new rolex at an incredible price and with wonderful service. I will buy from them again. Thank you Jolien. :-)
